title: Level 6 required to post a discussion or comment
body: I've already reached level 6 but I still can't post or comment on certain boards (in the Boards Profile it still says I'm level 2) as it apparently thinks that I haven't reached that level yet. Riot Pls. I wanna be part of this community too. Thanks.

replies.body: No worries! Once you posted here it forced those levels to sync up with each other, and now you're showing as level 6 to me ^_^!
Haha fix your boards rito XD

May I chime in?
I can post here on the NA boards but not on my native OCE boards. That includes the Help and Support boards. Attempting to report a bug brings be back to the NA boards.
Any idea why this might be? I'm level 30, and I play on the OCE server.

So wait. I've been having the exact same problem - level 5 in the client, level 1 on the site. You're saying just posting in Help & Support forum fixes that? o.o

Wish I'd known that sooner. ^.^' I've been reading posts all day, wishing I could at least reply to some of them...
Oh nooooooo I'm sorry to have been the one to finally mention it xD!!!! At least now you know you can post! You're showing as level 5 for me now ^_^!
